verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Let it rain, let it rain.
Open the flood gates of Heaven.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I feel The rain of your Love,
I feel The wind of your Spirit .
And now the heartbeat of heaven,
Let us hear (x2)

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Let it rain,
Let it rain.
Open the flood gates of heaven,
(repeat)
